section.title: Introduction
section.para: This plugin provides tools for text encoding using an XML vocabulary called Text Encoding for Interchange (TEI).
For more information about TEI, visit the website of the Text Encoding Initiative Consortium.

section.title: Toolbar buttons
section.para: The TEI toolbar contains the following buttons:

listitem.para: The Update TEI Package button downloads a package of TEI-related files from the TEI Consortium's website. To specify a different location to download the package from, use the options dialog.

The New TEI file from template button opens a hierarchical menu of TEI template files, provided by the TEI package. Selecting one of the templates will create a new document based on the selected template.

section.para: These operations are also listed in the menu which appears for TEI under the Plugins heading.

section.title: Options
section.para: There are two options which can be set using the pane for TEI in the Plugin Shortcuts section of the general options dialog:

listitem.para: The Auto-update TEI package checkbox causes the TEI Plugin to check for updates to the TEI package and download them automatically.

The TEI package update URL field specifies the location of a metadata resource which lists the avaiable versions of the TEI package. When the TEI Consortium updates the package metadata resource to point to a new package, the TEI Plugin will download and install the new package.
